rsocsim 1.5.9

Package index

All functions

create_simulation_folder()
create a folder in the user-dir of the current user in the socsim-subfolder
create_sup_file()
create a basic .sup file for a simulation the simulation is only a simple one the file will be saved into the sim-folder
estimate_fertility_rates()
Estimate yearly age-specific fertility rates (ASFR) from a SOCSIM-generated population file
estimate_mortality_rates()
Estimate yearly age-specific mortality rates (ASMR) from a SOCSIM-generated population file
read_omar()
Read output marriage file into a data frame
read_opop()
Read output population file into a data frame
retrieve_kin()
Identify members of a kin network for an individual or individuals of interest.
rsocsim-package rsocsim
SOCSIM Package for R. Run Social microsimulations directly from R.
run1simulationwithfile_from_binary()
Run a single socsim-simulation with a socsim binary. the place The results will be saved into that folder
run1simulationwithfile_inprocess()
Run a socsim-simulation in the r-process
simulation_time_to_years()
simulation_time_to_years convert the time measures.
socsim()
Run a single socsim-simulation with a given supervisory-file and folder. The results will be saved into that folder

Developed by Tom Theile, Diego Alburez-Gutierrez, Mallika Snyder, Liliana P. Calderón-Bernal.
